220: 大家小心…这座塔里的道路错综复杂，注意不要分散。
皆さん、気を付けてください……この塔内の道は複雑に入り組んでいます。はぐれないようにしてください。
여러분, 조심하세요…… 이 탑 안의 길은 복잡하게 얽혀 있습니다. 떨어지지 않게 해 주세요.
Everyone, please be careful. The paths in this tower are intricate and complicated. Try not to get separated from the rest of the group.
Be careful everyone...the paths in this tower are intricate, so be careful not to spread out.
Everyone, please be careful ...... The paths in this tower are intricate and complicated. Try not to get separated from the rest of the group.
原来塔的内部是这种构造…这些白色的墙壁好像是某种角质物的感觉……
塔の内部ってこんな構造になっていたのね……この白い壁、角質みたいな質感ね……。
탑 내부가 이런 구조였던 거네…… 이 하얀 벽, 각질 같은 질감이네…….
So that's how the inside of the tower is constructed...these white walls seem to have the feel of some kind of horcruxes ......
The inside of the tower had such a structure. ...... This white wall has a horny texture. ......
如同巴别塔一般无限上升的螺旋走廊！实在是太壮观了……
バベルの塔が如く、無限に続く螺旋回廊！実に壮観……！
바벨의 탑처럼 끝없이 이어지는 나선 회랑! 정말 장관이네……!
Like the Tower of Babel, an endless spiral corridor! Truly spectacular ......!
A spiral corridor that rises infinitely like the Tower of Babel! It's just spectacular ......
Like the Tower of Babel, an endless spiral corridor! Truly spectacular. ......
如果伊瑟琳在的话或许能获得更多的情报吧…不过我们也没时间深入调查了，现在的目的只有一个，那就是到达塔顶！
イザーリンがいれば、もっと多くの情報を入手できたかもしれません……ですが、今は細かく調べている時間はありません。#n今の目的はただ1つ、塔の頂上だけです！
이자린이 있으면, 더 많은 정보를 얻을 수 있었을지도 모르겠지만…… 지금은 자세히 조사할 시간이 없어요.#n지금의 목적은 오직 하나, 탑의 정상뿐입니다!
If Yiserin was here, we could have gotten more information from her...... but we don't have time to be analyzing everything right now. We have only one goal now: the top of the tower!
Perhaps Estherine could have gotten more information if she was there...but we don't have time to dig deeper, there's only one goal now, and that's to reach the top of the tower!
If Estherine were here, we could have gotten more information from ......, but we don't have time to go into detail right now. We have only one goal now: the top of the tower!
嗯，但毕竟是陌生的环境，还是小心前进为好，如果有什么陷阱的话就麻烦了。
そうね。でも、得体の知れない環境だからこそ、注意して進んだ方がいいわ。何か罠でもあったら面倒よ。
그래요. 하지만 정체를 알 수 없는 환경이니까 더욱 조심하며 나아가는 게 좋아요. 함정 같은 게 있으면 골치 아프니까요.
Yes, that's right. But because of the unknown environment, it is better to proceed with caution. If there are any traps, it will be troublesome.
Well, but after all, it's an unfamiliar environment, so it's better to proceed with caution, if there are any traps it'll be troublesome.
Yes, it is. But because of the unknown environment, it is better to proceed with caution. If there are any traps, it will be troublesome.
呜…这些闪耀的光球到底是……
うっ……この光り輝く球は一体……？
Ugh ...... what is this glowing ball ......?
Oooh...what the hell are these shining balls of light ......
Ugh ...... what is this glowing ball ......?
快过来吧…我在这里等你……
早くおいでよ……ここであなたのことを待っているから……。
빨리 오라구…… 여기서 당신을 기다리고 있으니까…….
Come on over...I'm here for you ......
Come quickly ...... because I'll be waiting for you here .......
从此之后…再也不离不弃……
これから先……もう離れないからね……。
From here on out...never to leave ......
I'm not leaving ...... again from now on. ......
九霄？どうしたのですか？
刚刚从这个光球里传来了某个声音！你们难道没听到么？
今、この球から何か声が聞こえて！皆は聞こえなかったのか？
지금, 이 구체에서 무언가 목소리가 들려! 다들 들리지 않았어?
I heard something coming from this ball! Didn't you guys hear it?
A certain voice just came from this ball of light! Didn't you hear it?
I just heard some voices from this ball! Didn't you guys hear it?
…抱歉，我好像没有听到任何声音。
……すみませんが、ブローニャには何も聞こえませんでした。
...Sorry, I don't seem to hear anything.
...Sorry, I don't seem to be hearing anything.
...... sorry, I didn't hear anything in Bronya.
或许是幻觉也说不定…这些光球在白色的背景下妖异地闪烁着，很容易混淆人的视听……
幻聴かもしれません……。#nこの光の球たちは白く怪しく光り輝いています。人の視聴覚を混乱させる力があるのかもしれません……。
환청일지도 모르겠어요......#n이 빛의 구체들은 하얗고 수상하게 빛나고 있어요. 사람의 시청각을 혼란시키는 힘이 있을지도 모르겠어요......
Maybe it's a hallucination too...these balls of light flickered demonically against the white background, easily confusing people ......
It may be an auditory hallucination. ...... These balls of light are glowing white and suspiciously bright. They may have the power to confuse people's audiovisual perception. ......
怎么会…难道又是只有九霄大人才能听到的来自启示录的昭示么？
な、なんで……まさか、また九霄様にしか聞こえない黙示録のお告げなのか？
왜, 왜...... 설마, 또 큐쇼님만 들을 수 있는 묵시록의 계시인가요?
How could it be...could it be another manifestation from the Apocalypse that only Lord Kyuushou can hear?
Why, why ...... no way, is it another apocalyptic omen that only Kyuushou can hear?
忘记一切的悲伤…把心交给我来保护……
全ての悲しみを忘れるの……守ってあげるから心を私に委ねて……。
모든 슬픔을 잊을 거야...... 지켜줄 테니 마음을 내게 맡겨......
Forget all your sorrows ...... I'll protect you, give your heart to me .......
Forget all your sorrows...give your heart to me for protection ......
Forget all your sorrows ...... I'll protect you, give your heart to me .......
不要害怕…请牵着我的手……
怖がらないで……私と手をつないで……。
Don't be afraid...please take my hand ......
Don't be afraid to ...... hold my hand .......
我们会在这里…迎来幸福的永恒……
私たちはここにいるわ……幸せな永遠を迎えるの……。
우리는 여기에 있어…… 행복한 영원을 맞이하는 거야…….
We'll be here...for a happy eternity ......
We're here ...... to welcome you to a happy eternity. ......
<color=#a3f7fcFF>芽衣…如果这个世界没有崩坏的话你会做什么呢？</color>

<color=#a3f7fcFF>Mei Senpai ...... If there had been no Honkai in this world, what would you have done? </color>
<color=#c2b4ffFFF>If there was no Honkai, you can go to ....... </color>
<color=#c2b4ffFF>大概会像普通的女孩子一样，学一些自己喜欢的东西，考上自己希望的大学，然后组建自己的家庭，和自己爱着的人走完幸福而又平淡的一生。</color>
<color=#c2b4ffFF>きっと、普通の女の子と同じように、自分の好きなことを勉強して、自分の行きたい大学に入って、そして自分の家庭を築いて、自分の愛する人と幸せで平凡な一生を最後まで歩んで行たと思う。</color>
<color=#c2b4ffFF>분명, 평범한 여자아이처럼 자신이 좋아하는 것을 공부하고, 자신이 가고 싶은 대학에 들어가서, 그리고 자신의 가정을 이루고, 자신이 사랑하는 사람과 행복하고 평범한 일생을 끝까지 걸어갔을 거라 생각해.</color>

<color=#c2b4ffFF>I'm sure that I would have studied what I wanted, entered the university I wanted to go to, and then built my own family and lived a happy and ordinary life with my loved ones, just like any other girl. </color>

<color=#c2b4ffFF>Probably, she will be like a normal girl, study something she likes, get into the university she wishes to go to, and then start her own family, and go through a happy and uneventful life with the person she loves. </color

<color=#c2b4ffFFFF>I am sure that she would have studied what she wanted, entered the university she wanted to go to, and then built her own family and lived a happy and ordinary life with her loved ones to the end, just like any other girl. </color>

<color=#a3f7fcFF>I would have tried to get ...... countless wishes before ...... for sure. </color>

<color=#a3f7fcFF>I wanted to attend the same school as Mei, eat bento together under the cherry blossom tree, and spend the entire lunch break lazing around. </color>
<color=#a3f7fcFF>Wanting to attend the same school as Mei, eat bento together under the cherry blossom tree, and spend the entire lunch break lazing around. </color>

<color=#a3f7fcFF>想和芽衣一起去周游世界，在美丽的风景下合影，把我们的身影永远保存在珍贵的相册里。</color>
<color=#a3f7fcFF>芽衣先輩と一緒に世界を回って、美しい景色を背に二人の写真を撮って、#n私たちの姿を大切にアルバムの中に永遠に残しておきたい。</color>
<color=#a3f7fcFF>메이 선배와 함께 세계를 돌아다니며, 아름다운 경치를 배경으로 우리 둘의 사진을 찍고,#n우리의 모습을 소중히 앨범 속에 영원히 남겨두고 싶어. </color>
<color=#a3f7fcFF>I wanted to go around the world with Mei-senpai and take a picture of the two of us against a beautiful landscape, then keep the photograph in a cherished album forever.</color>
<color=#a3f7fcFF>Want to travel around the world with Mei, take pictures together under the beautiful scenery, and keep our figures in a precious album forever. </color
<color=#a3f7fcFF>I want to go around the world with Mei senior and take a picture of the two of us against a beautiful landscape and keep our image in a cherished album forever. </color>
<color=#a3f7fcFF>想和芽衣盖一座海边的小木屋，一起看潮起潮落，一起在海风吹拂的沙滩上捡贝壳，然后在月光的拥抱下入眠。</color>
<color=#a3f7fcFF>海辺に小屋を建てて、芽衣先輩と一緒に潮の満ち引きを見て、一緒に海風に吹かれながら砂浜で貝殻を拾って、#nそして、月明りの下で抱き合いながら眠りたい。</color>
<color=#a3f7fcFF>해변에 오두막을 짓고, 메이 선배와 함께 조수의 밀물과 썰물을 보며, 함께 바닷바람을 맞으며 모래사장에서 조개껍질을 주우며,#n그리고 달빛 아래서 서로 안으며 잠들고 싶어. </color>

<color=#a3f7fcFF>I wanted to build a hut on the beach, watch the tide rise and fall with Mei-senpai, pick up shells on the beach in the ocean breeze together, and sleep under the moonlight in each others' arms.</color>
